children.value: processing pathways for the visual medium
things you can do with that REPL:

imitation (mimesis): replicating as exactly as possible something else that your eyes see
impression: catching and using the shorthand that your visual processing uses
representation: working to indicate a thing to you via the visual medium, not necessarily by replicating it
abstraction: taking some specific quality of a subject, and working to convey

cubism: impression + abstraction + representation
impressionism: impression
composition: representation + impression
design: representation + abstraction + function
